A version of '''[[Indev 0.31]]''' was released on '''January 29, 2010''', at 23:32 UTC,<ref>{{Cite IRC logs|Adura|tz=standard|file=2010-01-29_#minecraft.log|"18:32:57 <Notch> ok, it's been updated now :D"}}</ref> which added new tools and items.<ref name="additions">{{Cite IRC logs|Adura|tz=standard|file=2010-01-29_#minecraft.log|"18:31:48 <Griob> notch what will the next indev update contain?"..."18:32:09 <Notch> you can make bowls, chests, workbenches and mushroom stew now"}}</ref>

== Additions ==
{{Additions table
|Crafting Table
|Golden Sword
|Golden Axe
|Golden Pickaxe
|Golden Shovel
|Bowl
|Mushroom Stew
}}

=== Blocks ===
[[File:Crafting Table JE1 BE1.png|32px]]''' [[Workbench]]'''<ref>{{Cite IRC logs|Adura|tz=standard|file=2010-01-29_#minecraft.log|"18:12:01 <Notch> soon: workbenches"}}</ref><ref name="additions" />
* Pressing {{control|use}} on a workbench opens a 3×3 crafting grid.
* Broken faster by swords.
* Crafted with [[planks]].
{{Crafting table
|A2=Oak Planks
|A3=Oak Planks
|B2=Oak Planks
|B3=Oak Planks
|Output=Crafting Table}}

=== Items ===
[[File:Bowl JE1 BE1.png|32px]]''' [[Bowl]]'''<ref name="bowl and stew">{{Cite IRC logs|Adura|tz=standard|file=2010-01-29_#minecraft.log|"17:35:32 <Notch> wahey, in the next update, you make make bowls. And in bowls, you can make mushroom stew.}}</ref><ref name="additions"/>
* Used to make mushroom stew.
* Crafted with [[planks]].

|A2=Oak Planks
|C2=Oak Planks

'''{{Animate|Golden Axe JE1.png; Golden Pickaxe JE1.png; Golden Shovel JE1.png; Golden Sword JE1.png|32px}} [[Golden]] [[sword]]s, [[axe]]s, [[pickaxe]]s and [[shovel]]s'''<ref>{{Cite IRC logs|Adura|tz=standard|file=2010-01-29_#minecraft.log|"19:21:36 <Snowman> Ooooh, gold weapons and tools"}}</ref>
* Only the golden sword is craftable.<ref>{{Cite IRC logs|Adura|tz=standard|file=2010-01-29_#minecraft.log|"19:32:24 <Snowman> And Notch, why is there only the gold sword ingame, but the tools in the files?"}}</ref>
* Crafted with [[golden ingot]]s and a [[stick]].
{{Crafting table
|B1=Gold Ingot
|B2=Gold Ingot
|B3=Stick
|Output=Golden Sword}}

'''[[File:Mushroom Stew JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Mushroom Stew]]'''<ref name="bowl and stew" /><ref name="additions" />
* New food item.
* Restores {{Health|8}} health.<ref>{{Cite IRC logs|Adura|tz=standard|file=2010-01-29_#minecraft.log|"17:36:45 <Droqen> Notch, how much?"..."17:36:50 <Notch> 4 hearts"}}</ref>
* Crafted with a [[bowl]], a [[brown mushroom|brown]] and [[red mushroom]].
{{Crafting table
|B1=Brown Mushroom; Red Mushroom
|B2=Red Mushroom; Brown Mushroom
|B3=Bowl
|Output=Mushroom Stew}}

=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Crafting]]'''
* Added 2&times;2 crafting grid to the player [[inventory]].<ref>{{Cite IRC logs|Adura|tz=standard|file=2010-01-29_#minecraft.log|"17:13:52 <Notch> btw, there's a 2&times;2 crafting area in the inventory now"}}</ref>

=== Items ===
'''{{Animate|Wooden Axe JE1 BE1.png; Stone Axe JE1 BE1.png; Iron Axe JE4 BE1.png; Golden Axe JE1.png; Diamond Axe JE1 BE1.png|32px}} [[Axe]]s'''
* Axes can now be crafted on either side.<ref>{{Cite IRC logs|Adura|tz=standard|file=2010-01-29_#minecraft.log|"18:41:28 <LF> Oh, Notch have you fixed that you can only make axes using [OO-][OW-][-W-] and not [-OO][-WO][-W-]"..."18:41:43 <Notch> yes! All recipes can be mirrored"}}</ref>

'''[[File:Diamond JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Diamond]]'''
* Is now called "diamond" instead of "emerald".

== Technical ==
=== General ===
* Online saving/loading worlds is disabled<ref>{{Cite IRC logs|Adura|tz=standard|file=2010-01-29_#minecraft.log|"18:35:08 <Notch> it doesn't load old levels"..."18:35:52 <Notch> there's no online saving or loading in indev"}}</ref>
* Game frame rate is limited to 60 fps.<ref>{{Cite IRC logs|Adura|tz=standard|file=2010-01-29_#minecraft.log|"18:45:42 <vede> Any idea why my framerate is always down around 60 now, Notch?"..."18:45:56 <Notch> no idea. Did you turn on vsynch?"..."18:46:22 <vede> It was fine a few hours ago."..."18:46:34 <vede> But now it's always between 30 and 60."..."18:46:50 <HAL9000> and mine is around 60 constantly too"..."18:46:57 <Notch> Ok, fixed in the next update ;D"}}</ref>

== Removals ==
'''[[Crafting]]'''
* Removed 3&times;3 inventory crafting grid by pressing {{key|B}}.<ref>{{Cite IRC logs|Adura|tz=standard|file=2010-01-29_#minecraft.log|"18:48:45 <Notch>	B is gone!"}}</ref>
* Removed all [[starting house]] [[chest]]s.<ref>{{Cite IRC logs|Adura|tz=standard|file=2010-01-29_#minecraft.log|18:38:33 <P_R_Deltoid> hah, you took out the chests?"}}</ref>
